titleStmt.title: A true discourse vvherin is set downe the wonderfull mercy of God, shewed towardes the Christians, on the two and twenty of Iune. 1593 against the Turke, before Syssek in Croatia. Truly translated out of the high Dutch coppie. Printed at Vienna.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [J. Windet for] Iohn Wolfe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
